## DefaultCrudRepository.registerInclusionResolver() method

Register an inclusion resolver for the related model name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerInclusionResolver(relationName: string, resolver: InclusionResolver<T, Entity>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  relationName | <code>string</code> | Name of the relation defined on the source model |
|  resolver | <code>InclusionResolver&lt;T, Entity&gt;</code> | Resolver function for getting related model entities |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
